title: 325E.34 FREE NEWSPAPERS; EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO DISTRIBUTE PROHIBITED.
text:
For the purposes of this section, the terms in paragraphs (a) and (b) have the meanings given them.
(a) "Newspaper" means a publication issued regularly by the same person or corporation, or a successor, whether the name of the publication is the same or different.
(b) "Place of public accommodation" has the meaning given in section 363A.03, subdivision 34.
No contract may provide for an exclusive right to display free newspapers for distribution in any place of public accommodation.
